description: This file defines a Backbone.js view for a todo item in a TodoMVC application, including event handling, rendering, and model interactions.

classes.name: app.TodoView
classes.description: A Backbone View representing a single todo item, handling rendering and user interactions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Sets up event listeners for model changes, destruction, and visibility.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the todo item, avoiding redundant renders due to Backbone LocalStorage bug.

methods.name: toggleVisible
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the todo item based on its completion status.

methods.name: isHidden
methods.description: Determines if the todo item should be hidden based on filter state.

methods.name: toggleCompleted
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of the model.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enters editing mode, focusing the input field.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Exits editing mode, saving or clearing the model based on input.

methods.name: updateOnEnter
methods.description: Handles Enter key press to save changes.

methods.name: revertOnEscape
methods.description: Handles Escape key press to cancel editing.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Destroys the model and removes the view.
